title: Iran’s Information Warfare During the December 2025 - January 2026 Protests and Its Continued Influence on Israel and the West
desc: In this article, Daniel Haberfeld analyzes Iran's information-warfare strategy that reframed domestic unrest as a foreign conspiracy, using narrative control and external influence operations against Israel and the West as core tools of regime survival.
